reviewText: My 3 kids (5 1/2, 3 & 1) LOVE Word World! We have over 20 saved to our DVR! I bought this for my niece's 4th birthday. Entertaining & Educational!! It's funny how quickly they pick this up!! My 3 year old now walks around spelling out things! "Look mom, it's a H-A-T!" "Can I bounce the B-A-L-L?"
some of the series was not appropriate for a three year old.  saving for later.
Grandson loved them
The grandchildren love these dvds and I love them for the fact of the learning aspect.
Love this program so much! Super fast shipping, excellent condition!
My niece loved it
Great one!
great videos! very entertaining, my granddaughter learned alot!

The kids love it. I don't like if people make too much fuss about teaching young children their letters. Honestly, I think there is too much pressure on kindergarten/ elementary kids and their teachers (I'm fed up with testing and my son is only in 1st grade). However, this series does teach children in a playful way. It's all about having fun with it and enjoying it and this is definitely better than lots of the other stuff playing on tv.

After giving this as a gift to my 2 year old nephew, the kid started learning how to actually spell, read, and write. It was like a Christmas miracle. Almost one year exactly has passed,  and he is 3 now,  and he looks so adorable heading to his 5 grade class with a the other big kids. The teacher even let's him grade homework sometimes; it's great.
My grandson loved it.
My kids love this Dvd set. As a bonus you cannot find a bargain for this package easily. Believe me I've  checked
Great for the grandkids. They love it!
Such a great investment for your kids

My son started being interested in this show when he was about 6 months old he just had his second birthday and if he doesn't get to watch at least one episode on hulu a day he is a nightmare so I bought the DVD set and he could sit in his room for hours watching the same show over and over. They even have catchy theme song a that I sing when I'm not even watching it.
My grandson loves these dvds..great packaging and perfect quality...a must buy!
We LOVE Wordworld.

Our child loves Word World.  I love Word World.  Really, it's an ingenious show using letters to create characters.  It's educational, happy, and entertaining!  Our local PBS doesn't air the show anymore so we've been buying the DVDs.
Good learning show and entertains my son
When I first saw this show I was surprise how it was a really good show for kids I say better then any kids learning out there be far
Awsome dvd my 2 year old spells rocket and other words as well its well worth the buy. Word world is very educational
Great value! Grands love WORD WORLD! I do think it is foolish to require a certain number of word for rating!!!!!!

Word World is great!  Bought this set for my daughter after Word World was taken off of Netflix.  This cute show really helped her start putting letters and words together, and the colors are vibrant.  Highly recommend for toddlers and little ones!
2 year old absolutely loves Word World.  Can't get enough of it.  Good lessons for even a young learner.  Ordering more episodes for when traveling.
This is the only show my 10 month old will sit down and watch. We don't do a lot of TV in our house hold. But when we do we definitely always reach for word world. You won't be disappointed!
My son won't put these DVDs down. He loves singing the catchy tunes. What a wonderful educational program that encourages shy kids to speak  with confidence and a smile.

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my Granddaughters.  I think they are happy with it.
Thank you for the prompt service
My two year old loves Word World !! His Favorite is Rocket :)  He spells it along and sings along . He is learning Letters and everything!! He says ; Mommy , I watch wold wurld!!

Watch out Nick Jr. PBS Kids may have some shows that can really educate your child. Because of this show my daughter knows some sights words. She actually learned the phonics of the the alphabet with this show. She would see some letters and tell me, "Mama, letter B... ba ba B" I nearly fell to the floor when I heard her say that for the first time. At the time was about 4 months shy of 2. If my daughter loves it. Then I love it.

My 4 year old has been asking for Word World ever since KPBS stopped showing it.  So I ordered online.  Not only are they learning about letters and spelling, my son is also learning about friendships and caring.  Its a great start to learning to read.
I love watching these on TV with my two year old. They are clever and help children learn to read and identifying words.
The grandkids love it and it has helped them learn to associate words and objects and also has helped recognized letters
My children love the show. My 4 year old wants to watch them over and over. She has learned so many new words and letters and is trying to spell more things.
It's a great set of DVDs. The program is so educational, even we the parents enjoy it! These are the original DVDs and they arrived in time.

I have a 3 year old and a 1 year old and both love WordWorld. We purchased these DVDs so we didn't have to watch the clock to catch the shows on TV. I enjoy hearing my kids laughing at a show and knowing they are learning at the same time.

Here are the DVDs and titles for the episodes included:
The Race to Mystery Island -- PIG's Present, The Race to Mystery Island, The Rainbow Birthday Cake, One Hat Fits All
Castles in the Sea -- Castles in the Sea, The Dancing DUCK Bonanza, A Star is Born, Tick Tock Space Clock
Rocket to the Moon -- Pies, Pies, Pies!, Rocket to the Moon, Dog Wants to Play Ball, There's an Ant in Every Giant

All the DVDs are great and purchasing the 3-pack saves money. I highly recommend this product!
Both kids love Word World.  It's so creative in how they take the words and turn it into the actual item.  It keeps both my kids entertained plus they are learning something educational.
My 2 year old loves this show.  It's her favorite on PBS, and she's really started to repeat the alphabet sounds and the words, and I love watching her.  I"m glad they sell DVD packs of it!
I purchased this for as a gift for my niece for Christmas. She loves Word World and my sister loves that it is educational too. Very happy with this purchase!

This is an amazing series for a kiddo who loves word world. we have all dvds and
it took us time to collect them, this is great opportunity to save time and money.
The best way to encourage a child to learn is to buy the words world animals just
like the ones in dvd. I highly recommend the famous Word World pull apart plush plush soft animals to go with it.
The babies and kids love them so much. You can't get them anymore at stores
but if you are lucky you can come across the set on e bay.
It is worth all the money as it helps a child to learn so fast so early so much.
It is also amazing how much they sell for even used ones so it is good investment.
Well worth the price.

Great little DVD set.  All of these videos are cute and educational--my kids get very excited when I turn them on.  I love that they are learning to letters and to spell as they watch.  This is a great collection of what is a clever and educational show.

My daughter is 2 years old and LOVES, LOVES, LOVES Word World. She mimics the letters, sounds and words. She finds it very entertaining and mama finds it very educational. Couldn't have asked for more. Highly recommended.
If you are looking for something entertaining and educational this is a great dvd set for your child.  My grandchildren love it.
thanks
Great
Excellent kids videos that combine good learning and entertainment.
My wore all 3 DVDs out we had to buy another set
my 3.5 son loves it.
My son LOVES these but we love them more. He goes around the house spelling things now. I highly recommend this product. Big fans!
My daughter absolutely loves this show! Great values and morals for a preschooler learning to read and write.
My kids love these!  They really help my 3 year old with reading concepts!
perfect for my son we have watched it over 100 times
